QuestData.Title: Anything But Water
QuestData.Description: Look, buddy. Either you're here to help me find some drink, or you're in the way.$B$BWhy don't ya go down to the old storehouse and look downstairs. I had a mighty suspicion that ol' bookkeeper up in there was sneaking sips between pages. I bet he has a keg in his basement!$B$BIf ya find anything, come straight back to me! No dallyin'... this is urgent!
QuestData.LogDescription: Check the cellar Eoin Dunwald mentioned for a keg.
QuestData.CompletionText: You stink of sober! Find me some drink!
QuestData.RewardText: Donnelly's belly! That's more like it. Good to not be dyin' of the thirst again.$B$BHere, have some. Good ol' Eoin's never so impolite as ta not share!
